author: missirol
body:
#### PR description:

This PR suggests a technical update of the Patatrack customisation functions, to make them even more robust against upcoming updates to the HLT menus (e.g. the integration of the CPU-only version of Run-3 HLT tracking in `ConfDB`).

These changes are meant to be backward-compatible. The idea is that the updated functions should work on both old and future menus, minimising the need to update these customisations in CMSSW as the HLT menus get updated in `ConfDB`.

Merely technical. Must not change any of the outputs (not even python configs).

Thanks to @fwyzard for his help with the implementation.

FYI: @Sam-Harper @silviodonato

Manual checks, e.g. [this script](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/files/7735529/test.sh.txt).
